llm_res.rule: transferFrom function should return true on success.

To prevent attack vectors like the one described here and discussed here, clients SHOULD make sure to create user interfaces in such a way that they set the allowance first to 0 before setting it to another value for the same spender. THOUGH The contract itself shouldn’t enforce it, to allow backwards compatibility with contracts deployed before.
The function balanceOf(address _owner) should return the account balance of another account with address _owner.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
allowance function should return the remaining number of tokens that spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of owner through transferFrom. It should not return a modified value.
